India's heralded batting line-up faltered under pressure, failing to chase 188. Afghanistan's Ministry of Defence stated that dozens of innocent civilians were martyred and wounded after airstrikes hit a school and residential homes.

description: Moscow's four international airports faced temporary closures on Sunday as air defence systems downed 11 Ukrainian drones approaching the capital. This comes amid ongoing cross-border drone and missile attacks between Russia and Ukraine, now in its fourth year.

description: A Delhi court has remanded four Indian Youth Congress workers to five-day police custody, deeming their protest at the AI Impact Summit-2026 a "blatant assault on public order" that harmed India's diplomatic image. The activists wore provocative T-shirts, chanted slogans, and assaulted police personnel, raising concerns about potential external conspiracies and absconding associates.

description: Steve Jobs, upon his return to Apple in 1997, found inspiration in Nike's marketing to revitalize the brand. He emphasized that marketing should focus on values and what a company is about, not just product specifications.

title: I came in search of jinns, but the haunting was disappointing: A tale from Delhi’s Jamali Kamali
description: A travel writer ventured to Delhi's Jamali Kamali Mosque and Tomb, drawn by tales of hauntings. Instead of spectral encounters, the writer found a serene, historically rich monument marred by modern vandalism. The experience revealed a profound human element, with the silence and beauty overshadowing any supernatural whispers, prompting reflection on how history is misinterpreted.

Horrific double murder in Delhi: Woman, daughter killed; bodies found in bed box
description: A horrifying double murder in Sarita Vihar has left a 35-year-old woman and her six-year-old daughter dead, their bodies discovered hidden in a bed box. Police are investigating a neighbour, an accountant, as the prime suspect, exploring a motive of rejected advances. The husband returned home to find the door locked, initiating a desperate search for his family.

title: Two sisters found dead in Jodhpur on wedding eve; no suicide note recovered
description: Two sisters, Shobha (25) and Vimla (23), were found dead at their Jodhpur home on Friday, just a day before their scheduled weddings.  They were rushed to a hospital around 4 am after their health suddenly deteriorated, but were declared dead on arrival. Preliminary investigations suggest poisoning, with the post-mortem report to confirm the exact cause.

title: Connor McDavid and wife Lauren Kyle McDavid combined net worth 2026
description: The success of the professional career of Connor McDavid and his wife, Lauren Kyle McDavid, is reflected in the financial empire they have created. Whether it is McDavid and his lucrative Edmonton Oilers contract and endorsement book or the growing design and hospitality businesses of Lauren, the two have a combined net worth in 2026 that can be seen as a wise investment, brand strength and long-term excellence on and off the ice.

title: Taylor Swift’s one-word comment turns Shiffrin’s gold into Swiftie moment
description: Mikaela Shiffrin celebrated her 2026 Winter Olympics slalom gold with Taylor Swift lyrics on Instagram, then got a 1-word comment from the pop star: “HISTORIC ������.” Inside how Shiffrin uses “Ruin the Friendship” to fuel races, why Swift’s reply mattered, and how the singer keeps stealing scenes at the Winter Games with Breezy Johnson too.

title: Zoe Atkin family: Meet her parents, sister Izzy Atkin and their close bond
description: Zoe Atkin is on the verge of creating history for Team GB at the Milano Cortina 2026 Winter Olympics. The 23-year-old freestyle skier qualified first in the women’s freeski halfpipe event in Livigno. She now heads into the final as one of the strongest contenders for gold. Atkin has been in top form this season and arrives in Italy as the reigning world champion and World Cup leader.

title: Bezos's ex-wife record $7.2 bn donation in 2025 called 'bad donation', & Musk agrees
description: Philanthropist Mackenzie Scott has donated billions at an unprecedented pace, but Y Combinator CEO Garry Tan criticizes her approach as "bad." Tan argues her lack of oversight fosters mismanagement, likening it to "pouring sugar on the floor" and citing examples of alleged chaos and unintended consequences at recipient organizations.

title: Where will the Olympics be held in 2028, 2030 and 2032? Host cities explained
description: ​The 2026 Winter Olympics are taking place in northern Italy right now. Milan and Cortina d’Ampezzo are hosting athletes from around the world. As the Games get closer to the closing ceremony, people are already looking ahead. The next Olympic host cities have been decided, and preparations are moving forward.

title: Johnny Depp’s quiet act of friendship: How he gave Eric Dance a home and eased his ALS burden before passing
description: Johnny Depp offered a significant gesture of friendship to Eric Dane during his battle with ALS, providing him with rent-free accommodation in one of his Los Angeles homes. This support eased financial burdens for Dane as his health declined, allowing him to focus on his fight against the disease and his advocacy efforts.

title: FBI warns of ATM jackpotting incidents across US: What are they, how they work
description: Cybercriminals are increasingly targeting ATMs with 'jackpotting' malware, forcing machines to dispense cash without legitimate transactions. The FBI warns of a surge in these attacks, with significant financial losses reported. Threat actors exploit physical and software vulnerabilities, bypassing security to gain direct control and trigger rapid cash withdrawals, often leaving ATMs unexpectedly out of service.

title: Inside Sidney Crosby and Kathy Leutner’s combined $76M net worth
description: The net worth of Sidney Crosby and Kathy Leutner is estimated to be 76 million, with the ongoing NHL season. Penguins' captain has mostly acquired his fortune in salary and endorsements, whilst Leutner has established a separate model career. This is a breakdown of how the NHL star and his spouse are in their financial position in 2026.
